TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRawElementProviderFragmentRoot implements class System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment, class System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple

summary.span: 公开片段中根元素的方法和属性。

span.span: Exposes methods and properties on the root element in a fragment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由在框架; 一个根元素来实现此接口例如，一个列表框中，一个窗口。This interface is implemented by a root element within a framework; for example, a list box within a window. 相同的段，如列表项中的其他元素实现接口。Other elements in the same fragment, such as list items, implement the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment ElementProviderFromPoint(float64 x, float64 y) cil managed
Public Function ElementProviderFromPoint (x As Double, y As Double) As IRawElementProviderFragment

summary.span: 检索此片段中位于指定点处的元素。

span.span: Retrieves the element in this fragment that is at the specified point.

returns.span: 位于指定点处的子元素的提供程序（如果存在），或者根提供程序（如果该点位于此元素上，而不是位于任何子元素上）。

span.span: The provider for the child element at the specified point, if one exists, or the root provider if the point is on this element but not on any child element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果点位于另一个框架，位于此片段中的某个元素，该方法将返回承载该片段的元素。If the point is on an element in another framework that is hosted by this fragment, the method returns the element that hosts that fragment. 返回提供程序应对应于将接收鼠标输入指定点处的元素。The returned provider should correspond to the element that would receive mouse input at the specified point. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示此方法对于非滚动列表框中的一种可能的实现。The following code example shows one possible implementation of this method for a non-scrolling list box. 使用的每个项的高度计算指定的点处的列表项的索引并在该点返回的项。The index of the list item at the specified point is calculated using the height of each item, and the item at that point is returned. 如果在该点不存在任何项 (例如，它是列表框中的空白区域，该方法返回 null 引用 (`Nothing`)。If no item exists at that point (for example, it is a blank area of the list box, the method returns a null reference (`Nothing`). [!code-csharp[UIAFragmentProvider_snip#106](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFragmentProvider_snip/CSharp/ListFragment.cs#106)] [!code-vb[UIAFragmentProvider_snip#106](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFragmentProvider_snip/VisualBasic/ListFragment.vb#106)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment GetFocus() cil managed

summary.span: 检索片段中具有输入焦点的元素。

span.span: Retrieves the element in this fragment that has the input focus.

returns.span: 此片段中具有输入焦点的元素（如果有）的提供程序；否则为 null 引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ）。

span.span: The provider for the element in this fragment that has the input focus, if any; otherwise, a null reference ( in Visual Basic).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果焦点位于另一个框架，位于此片段中的某个元素，该方法将返回承载该片段的元素。If the focus is on an element in another framework that is hosted by this fragment, the method returns the element that hosts that fragment. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示此方法对于列表框中的一种可能的实现。The following code example shows one possible implementation of this method for a list box. 它返回当前选定的项列表中。It returns the currently selected item in the list.
